title: Smart Asset Receipt
description: Append-only signed receipt for an asset-local state channel (non-blockchain). The receipt commits to the applicable lawpack/ruleset digest sets, an optional transition envelope, and a deterministic next_root = SHA256(JCS(receipt_without_proof_and_next_root)).

asset_id.description: Asset identifier (sha256 hex), typically derived from SmartAssetGenesis.asset_id.

sequence.description: Monotonic sequence number within an asset receipt chain.

prev_root.description: Receipt-chain root before this receipt. For sequence=0 this SHOULD equal the asset chain genesis_root.

next_root.description: Receipt-chain root after this receipt. MUST equal SHA256(JCS(receipt_without_proof_and_next_root)).

jurisdiction_scope.description: Optional declaration of the jurisdictional scope this receipt claims to satisfy. Intended for multi-harbor / sharded compliance.

harbor_ids.description: Optional list of harbor/jurisdiction identifiers relevant to this receipt's compliance scope. Interpreted according to jurisdiction_scope.

harbor_quorum.description: Optional quorum threshold when jurisdiction_scope='quorum'. Verifiers MAY cross-check this against policy (registry VC / ruleset).

items.description: A raw sha256 digest string (legacy) OR an ArtifactRef (recommended; artifact_type MUST be 'lawpack').

lawpack_digest_set.description: Sorted set of lawpack digests (sha256) governing this asset operation snapshot.

items.description: A raw sha256 digest string (legacy) OR an ArtifactRef (recommended; artifact_type MUST be 'ruleset').

ruleset_digest_set.description: Sorted set of ruleset digests (sha256) governing this asset receipt chain.

transition_type_registry_digest_sha256.description: Optional digest commitment to a Transition Type Registry snapshot (snapshot_digest_sha256 from transition-types.lock.json). When present, receipts MAY omit per-transition schema/ruleset/circuit digests and rely on the registry mapping for semantics. Legacy form is a raw sha256 digest; preferred form is an ArtifactRef with artifact_type='transition-types'.

zk.description: Optional ZK proof scaffold. Proof verification is asset-specific; receipts commit to proof and verifier digests.

circuit_digest_sha256.description: Optional commitment to the circuit artifact. Legacy form is a raw sha256 digest; preferred form is an ArtifactRef with artifact_type='circuit'.

verifier_key_digest_sha256.description: Optional commitment to a verifier key artifact. Legacy form is a raw sha256 digest; preferred form is an ArtifactRef with artifact_type='proof-key'.

proof_sha256.description: Optional commitment to a proof blob. Legacy form is a raw sha256 digest; preferred form is an ArtifactRef with artifact_type='blob'.

proof.description: DataIntegrityProof (JCS + Ed25519) or array of proofs.
